text: The animals voted to choose a king. The camel and the elephant lined up to contest the ballots, hoping to be preferred over others because of their size and strength. But the monkey came and declared them both incapable of reigning. "The camel is no good", he said, "because it does not get angry at the evildoers. The elephant is not good for us either because we will have to be afraid of being attacked by a marran, an animal that the elephant fears. Strength is measured from the weakest point.
title: El camello, el elefante y el mono
author: nan Esopo
